QuestData.Title: Be Prepared
QuestData.Description: Every adventurer worth their salt knows never to step foot in a cave, dungeon, crypt or tomb without an ample supply of rope... right?$b$bYou can never have too much of this stuff!$b$bYou resolve to scrounging every scrap of it you can find from the skeletons here.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, rope! Thanks, kid.$b$bSomething tells me I'm going to need this.
